definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="DeathRattleText" type="String">DeathRattleText</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="184" y="30"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="9"/><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">I have seen the end, and have heard it named. The Night of Sorrows, the True Desolation. The Everstorm. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">They named it the Final Desolation, but they lied. Our gods lied. Oh, how they lied. The Everstorm comes. I hear its whispers, see its stormwall, know its heart. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">They come from the pit, two dead men, a heart in their hands, and I know that I have seen true glory.</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF3"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO3"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The love of men is a frigid thing, a mountain stream only three steps from the ice. We are his. Oh Stormfather... we are his. It is but a thousand days, and the Everstorm comes. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF4"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO4"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">I'm dying, aren't I? Healer, why do you take my blood? Who is that beside you, with his head of lines? I can see a distant sun, dark and cold, shining in a black sky. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF5"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO5"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Three of sixteen ruled, but now the Broken One reigns.</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF6"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO6"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The burdens of nine become mine. Why must I carry the madness of them all? Oh, Almighty, release me. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF7"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO7"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">A woman sits and scratches out her own eyes. Daughter of kings and winds, the vandal.</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF8"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO8"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">All is withdrawn for me. I stand against the one who saved my life. I protect the one who killed my promises. I raise my hand. The storm responds. </field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF9"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO9"><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Re-Shephir, the Midnight Mother, giving birth to abominations with her essence so dark, so terrible, so consuming. She is here! She watches me die!</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block inline="true" type="text_join"><mutation items="13"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> Collected on </field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="time_month"/></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/</field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="time_day_of_month"/></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/</field></block></value><value name="ADD6"><block type="time_year"/></value><value name="ADD7"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> Time: </field></block></value><value name="ADD8"><block type="time_hours"/></value><value name="ADD9"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">:</field></block></value><value name="ADD10"><block type="time_minutes"/></value><value name="ADD11"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">:</field></block></value><value name="ADD12"><block type="time_seconds"/></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="text" x="18" y="60"><field name="TEXT">Message</field></block><block y="1154"><field name="TEXT">A woman sits and scratches out her own eyes. Daughter of kings and winds, the vandal.</field></block><block type="entity_send_chat" x="55" y="1206"><value name="text"><block inline="true" type="text_join"><mutation items="6"/><value name="ADD1"><block type="time_year"/></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="time_month"/></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="time_day_of_month"/></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="time_day_of_week"/></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="time_hours"/></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block><block type="variables_get_string" x="18" y="1267"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field></block><block type="variables_get_string" x="18" y="1304"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:DeathRattleText</field></block></xml>
